juzs.text: Taiken o shōaku nasa reru kata ni shukufuku are. Hontōni kare wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru
(Kare wa) shi to nama o tsukura reta katadearu. Sore wa, anata gata no naka dare no okonai ga sugurete iru no ka o kokoromi rareru tame de, kare wa iryoku narabinaku kan'yōde ara reru

(Kare wa) issō issō ni, 7 ten o tsukura reru okata. Jihi amaneku okata no sōzō ni wa, sukoshi no fuchōwa mo nai koto o mirudearou. Sorede aratamete kansatsu shi nasai. Anata wa nani ka sakeme o miru no ka
Sore de imaichido,-me o agete miruga ī. Anata no shisen wa,(nani no kekkan mo sagashidasezu) tada bon'yari shite moto ni modoru dakedearu
Kare wa tōmyō (hoshi) o motte, sai kasō no ten o kazari, akuma-tachi ni taisuru haritsuke (ryūsei) to nashi, mata kare-ra no tame ni rekka no chōbatsu o junbi shita
Kare-ra no omo o shinjinai mono ni wa, jigoku no chōbatsu ga aru. Nanto warui kaeri-shodearu koto yo
Kare-ra ga sono naka ni nagekoma reru toki, sore (jigoku) ga futtō suru ka no yō ni bukimide ki shi ion de unaru no o kare-ra wa kikou
Hageshī ikari no tame ni haretsu suru ka no yōdearu. Ichidan ga sono naka ni nagekoma reru tabi ni, soko no kanshu wa kare-ra ni,`anata gata ni, keikoku-sha wa yattekonakatta no ka.' To tou

Kare-ra wa iu. `Sōdesu, tashikani hitori no keikoku-sha ga watashi-tachi no moto ni yattekimashita. Daga watashi-tachi wa kyohi shite itta. “Arrā wa nani (no keiji) mo kudasa renai. Anata gata wa, taihen'na kago no naka ni iru dakedearu.”
Kare-ra wa nao iu. `Watashi-tachi ga kiki, jukukō shitanaraba, rekka no jūnin no nakaniha hairanakattadeshou ni
Kare-ra wa jibun no samazamana tsumi o mitometa. Rekka no jūnin wa,(yōsha kara) tōkuhanarete iru
Hontōni menimienai-nushi o, osoreru mono ni wa, yōsha to idaina hōshō ga arou
Anata gataga kotoba o kakushite ite mo, mata sore o arawashite mo, kare wa hontōni mune no naka no mono o shitte ora reru
Kare ga sōzō sa reta mono o, shiranaidearou ka. Kare wa, shin'ō o rikai shi tsūgyō nasa reru
Kare koso wa, daichi o anata gata ni tsukai yasuku nasa reta katadearu. Sorede sono sho chiiki o ōrai shi, kare no kate o taberuga yoi. Soshite fukkatsu no toki ni hakare ni mesa rete iku midearu
Daichi ga yureugoku toki, ten ni imasu kata ga, anata gata o sore ni nomikoma se rarenaidearou to, anshin shite iru no ka
Mata anata gata wa ten ni imasu kata ga,(saseki no) reppū o anata gata ni okura renaidearou to, anshin shite iru no ka. Yagate anata gata wa, waga keikoku ga ikaganaru mono ka o shirudearou
Hontōni anata gata izen no mono-tachi mo,(waga keikoku o) usodearu to shita. Sorede waga fukyō ga ikaga ni (osoroshī monode) atta ka

Kare-ra wa ue o tobutori ni tsuite kangaenai no ka. Tsubasa o hiroge, mata sore o tatamude wanai ka. Jihi amaneku okata no soto, dare ga sorera o sasaeru koto ga dekiyou. Hontōni kare wa, subete no koto o gozonji de ara reru
Jihi amaneku okata o sashioite anata gata o tasukeru gunzei to nari eru mono wa, daredearu no ka. Fushin-sha wa, mōsō shite iru nisuginai
Kare ga moshi o megumi o tome rareru to, anata gata ni megumi o nashi eru mono wa daredearu no ka. Iya kare-ra wa kōman to,(shinri kara no) kaihi ni koshūsuru
Kao o fusete (tada katakuna ni) aruku mono to, tadashī michi no ue o kisokutadashiku aruku mono to, dochira ga yoku michibika reru no ka
Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Kare koso wa anata gata o tsukuri, anata gata no tame ni, chōkaku, shikaku, kanjō (chiryoku) o atae rareta katadearu. Nanto anata gata no kansha no nen no usui koto yo
Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare koso wa, anata gata o chijō ni bunsan shi han'ei sa se rareta katadeari, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni atsume rareru
Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa,`moshi anata gata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kono keiyaku wa nanji (hatasa reru no)dearou ka.' To iu
Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni sore o shiru no wa, arrā dakedearu. Watashi wa kōmeina keikoku-sha nisuginai
Kare-ra ga me no hen ni sore o miru toki, fushin-sha-tachi no kao wa kanashimi ni kumoru. `Kore ga anata gata no motomete ita mono (yakusoku no jōju)dearu.' To tsuge rareru

Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka, moshi arrā ga, watashi ya watashi to issho no mono o horobosa rete mo, mata jihi o atae rarete mo, oyoso fushin-sha o tsūretsuna chōbatsu kara sukuu mono wa daredearou ka

Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare wa jihi amaneku okata de arare, watashi-tachi wa kare o shinkō shi, kare ni (subetewo) takusu. Yagate anata gata wa, akirakana kago no naka ni iru mono ga daredearu no ka o shirudearou
Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Moshi aru asa, anata gata no mizu ga chika ni shizumi sattanaraba, waki deru mizu o, anata gata ni motaraseru mono wa, ittai daredearu no ka
Nūn. Fude ni chikai kete, mata kaita mono ni oite chikau
Omo no onkei ni oite, anata wa kichigaide wanai
Iya, hontōni anata ni wa, tsukinai hōshō ga arou
Hontōni anata wa, sūkōna tokusei o sonaete iru
Yagate anata wa miyou, kare-ra mo mata mirudearou
Anata gata no dare ga kichigaidearu ka o
Hontōni anata no omo wa,-dō kara mayoi satta mono o, mottomo yoku shitte ora re, mata michibika rete iru mono o mottomo yoku shiri tsukusa reru katadearu
Sorede anata wa (shinri o) hinin suru mono ni shitagatte wa naranai
Kare-ra no negai wa, anata ga ayumiyoru koto de, sō nareba kare-ra mo dakyō shitai nodearu
Anata wa, hiretsuna chikai o tateru don'na mono ni mo kutsujū shite wa naranai
Chūshō shi, waruguchi o ii aruku mono
zenji o samatage, okite ni somuku tsumibukaimono
ranbō (zangyaku)na-sha, sono soto sujō no iyashī-sha
tomi to (ōku no) shijo o motte iru tame ni (sōdearu, korera no mono ni shitagatte wa naranai)
Kare ni waga shirushi ga Satoru 唱 Sa reru to,`sore wa mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu
Yagate ware wa, hana no ue ni yakiin o osudearou
Hontōni ware wa,(kaju)-en no mochinushi o kokoromita yō ni, kare-ra o kokoromita. Kare-ra ga, sōchō ni sore (kudamono) o shūkaku suru koto o chikatta toki ni
(arrā no o nozominaraba) to, jōken o tsukeru koto o shinakatta
Sore de kare-ra ga nemutte iru ma ni, anata no nushi kara no tenbatsu ga sore o osotta
Sorede asa ni wa, sore wa tsumitora reta yō ni natta
Sōchō kare-ra wa tagaini sakenda
Moshi shūkaku suru nonara anata gata no hata ni isogimashou
Sokode kare-ra wa tei koe ni sasayaki atte dekaketa
Kyō wa hitori no binbōnin mo, ano (kaju-en) ni haira sete wa narimasen
Kare-ra wa tsuyoku kokoro ni kimete, asa hayaku deteitta
Daga kare-ra ga sore o mita toki, itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, michi o machigaete iru
Iya, watashi-tachi wa (shūkaku-mono o) ubawareta
Kare-ra no naka, sukoshi odayakana hitori ga itta. `Anata gata wa dōshite (omo o) tataenai no ka to, watashi ga itta no ni
Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi no omo o tataeru. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa fugidearimashita.' To itta
Soko de kare-ra wa, tagaini semeai hajimeta
Kare-ra wa itta. `Ā kanashī, watashi-tachi wa hontōni ōheideshita
Omo wa kore ni kawaru, sara ni yoi (kaju-en) o atae rareru kamo shirenai. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa,(kaigo shite) omo ni tangan shimasu
Kono yōna mono ga,(gense no) chōbatsudearu. Daga raise no chōbatsu wa sarani ōkina monodearu. Moshi kare-ra ni wakatte itanaraba
Hontōni arrā o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-nushi no omoto ni ki kobi no rakuen ga arou
Ware wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi o, tsumibito no yō ni atsukau to demo iu no ka
Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Anata gata wa dō handan suru no ka
Soretomo anata gata ni wa, manabu ni tariru Keisuke ga aru no ka
Anata gata ga erabu mono wa, nani demo sono Keisuke no naka ni aru no ka
Soretomo anata gata wa, shinpan no hi made yūkōna seiyaku o wareto musunda no ka. Anata gataga shiryobunbetsu suru koto wa, tashikani anata gata no mono ni naru no ka
(Muhanmado yo) kare-ra ni toe. `Kare-ra no dare ga sore o hoshō suru nodesu ka
Matawa, kare-ra wa (omoni) haisuru mono ga aru no ka. Kare-ra ga tadashī nonara, sono haisuru mono o tsurete kitasa se nasai
Sune ga, gen wa ni sa reru hi (o omoi nasai). Kare-ra wa sajida suru yō motome rareru. Daga kare-ra ni wa dekinaidearou
Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o kōmurudearou. Sajida suru yō, tashika ni kare-ra wa yobikake rarete ita. Sonotoki gotai manzokunanoni (kyohi shita)
Sokode kono o kotoba (kuruān) o kyogidearu to suru mono o ware ni makase yo. Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzukanai hōmen kara, ippo ichiichi (daraku ni) michibiki
kare-ra o yūyo surudearou. Hontōni ware no keiryaku wa tsuyoku tashikadearu
Soretomo anata ga kare-ra ni hōshū o motome, sore de kare-ra wa futan o kase rareta no ka
Mata yūgen-kai ga kare-ra no temoto ni ari, sore de kare-ra wa (sore o) kakikudasu koto ga dekiru no ka
Dakara nintai shite, anata no omo no meirei o mate. Sakana no tomo no yōdeatte wa naranai. Kurushi-sa no amari (kare ga) sakenda toki (no yō ni)
Nushi kara no onkei ga kare ni tasshinakattanaraba, kare wa tsumi o owasa re, fumenboku ni fumōnochi ni suteraretadearou
Kono yō ni omo wa, kare o erabi seigi no to no hitori to nasa reta
Fushinjin-sha wa keikoku o kiku toki, sono (monosugoi) metsuki de, anata o 凡 Ndo taoren bakari ni suru. Kare-ra wa iu. `Hontōni kare wa tsuka reta monodesu
Daga, kono (kuruān) koso wa, ban'yū no tame no kunkai nihokanaranai
Tashikana shinjitsu
tashikana shinjitsu to wa nani ka
Tashikana shinjitsu ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Samūdo to ādo (no min) wa, totsuzen kuru saiyaku o kyogidearu to shita
Sore de samūdo wa raiun no arashi ni yotte horobosa reta
Mata ādo wa unari kuruu kaze ni yotte horobosa reta
Yoru 8-nichi ni watari, kare-ra ni taishi taema naku (arashi ga) osoi, sore de kuchita natsumeyashi no ki no yō ni,(subete no) min ga soko ni taorete iru no o, anata wa mitadearou
Sorede anata wa, kare-ra no naka, dare ka nokotte iru mono o miru no ka
Mata firuaun ya kare izen no mono ya horobosa reta sho toshi (no min) mo, tsumi o okashite ita
Kare-ra wa omo no shito ni shitagawanainode, kare wa mōretsuna chōbatsu de kare-ra o shobatsu shita
Ōmizu no toki, ware ga hakobune de anata gata o hakonda no wa

Sore de rappa ga ichi fuki fuka reta toki

Sore de migite ni sono (gyōjō)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `Koko ni (kite), anata gata wa watashi no (gyōjō)-ki o yome
Izure watashi (shinja) no seisan (shinpan) ni au koto ga, hontōni wakatte ita

Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, watashi wa anata gata e no kōmeina 1-ri no keikoku-shadesu
Anata gata wa arrā ni tsukae, kare o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai

Kare wa anata gata no samazamana tsumi o yurushi, sadame rareta kigen made, anata gata o yūyo nasa remasu. Hontōni arrā no kigen ga kita toki wa, yūyo sa remasen. Moshi anata gata ga wakatte itanaraba
Kare (nūfu) wa mōshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi wa yoru mo hiru mo, watashi no hitobito ni yobikakemashita
Daga, watashi no yobikake wa, tada (seidō kara no) tōhi o masu bakaridesu

Watashi ga kare-ra ni,“kare ga, anata gata o o yurushi ni naru noda” to yobikakeru toki, kare-ra wa yubi o jibun no mimi ni sashikomi, jibun de gaitō o kōmutte (fushinjin o) koshū shi, hitasura kōman ni narimasu
Sorede watashi wa,-goe o ōkiku shite kare-ra ni yobikakemashita
Arutoki wa kō ni, mata (arutoki wa) hisoka ni kare-ra ni (uttaete)
watashi wa iimashita. “Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o negae. Hontōni kare wa, tabitabi o yurushi nasa reru

anata gata no zaisan ya shijo o fuyashi, mata anata gata no tame ni, samazamana en ya (mizu no nagareru) kasen o mōke rareru
Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Arrā no goshinsetsu, gamandzuyo-sa ni taishite, nozomi o motanai to wa
Kare wa hontōni junjoyoku dankai o o tte anata gata o tsukura reta
Anata gata wa, arrā ga 7 ten o ikaga ni issō mata issō to, tsukura reta ka o kangaete minakatta no ka
Mata tsuki o sono Chū no akari to sa re, taiyō o (moeru) tōmyō to nasa reta ka o
Arrā wa anata gata o tsuchi kara sodate rare
sorekara, anata gata wa daichi ni kisa re, mata oki nobora se rareru
Mata arrā wa anata gata no tame ni, daichi o nobe hiroge rare
sokode anata gata wa, hiroi daidō o ōrai surudearou. ” To itte kika semashita
Nūfu wa (sarani) itta. `Omo yo, kare-ra wa watashi ni shitagaimasen. Jibun no zaisan to shijo to de, hametsu o jochō suru mono ni dake shitagaimasu
Soshite jūdaina sakubō o takuramimasu
Kare-ra wa iimasu. “Anata gata no kamigami o suteru na. Waddo mo suwāu mo, mata yagūsu mo yaūku mo nasuru mo, sutete wa naranai. ”
Kare-ra wa sudeni ōku no mono o mayowa semashita. (Omo yo) mayoi o hōnin sa rete mo, fugi o okonau mono o ōku shinaide kudasai
Kare-ra wa samazamana tsumi no tame ni obore sase rare, sarani hi goku ni okura re, arrā no soto ni wa, don'na enjo-sha mo e rarenakatta
Nūfu wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, fushinjin'na kyojū-sha o darehitori to shite chijō ni nokosanaide kudasai
Moshi anata ga kare-ra o nokosa rereba, kare-ra wa kanarazu anata ni tsukaeru mono o mayowa se, mata tsumiwookasu fushinjin'na mono no soto, umanaideshou

Omo yo, watashi to watashi no ryōshin o o yurushi kudasai. Mata shinja to shite watashi no ie ni hairu mono, mata (subete no) shinkō suru otoko to shinkō suru on'na-tachi o o yurushi kudasai. Soshite fugi o okonau mono-tachi ni wa, metsubō no soto ni wa (nani mo) kuwaenaide kudasai
Ie,`watashi ni kō keiji sa reta. Ichidan no jin ga (kuruān o) kiite itta. “Watashi-tachi wa, hontōni odorokubeki dokuju o kiita
Tadashī michi e no michibikidearu. Dakara watashi-tachi wa shinkō shi, omoni nanimono o mo haisanai
Songen ni shite ito takaki omo no o ikō yo, kare wa tsuma o metorazu,-ko mo mota renai
Watashi-tachi no naka no orokana mono ga, arrā ni taishi tohōmonai uso o hanashite ita
Shikashi watashi-tachi wa, ningen mo Jin mo, arrā ni tsuite uso o iubekide wa nai to kangaete ita
Hontōni arushu no ningen wa, jin no aru mono ni higo o motomeru. Shikashi sore wa, kare-ra no guretsu o jochō shita
